summary: Encapsulates the pretrained SeamlessM4T v2 model, handling configuration, weight loading, and inference utilities for multilingual speech‑to‑text and text‑to‑speech tasks.
business_intent: Provide developers with an out‑of‑the‑box, high‑quality multilingual translation and voice generation engine that can be integrated into applications like virtual assistants, customer support, media localization, and real‑time communication services.
